history.proof: intros A B f e. induction e as [|a e' IH]. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. qsimpl time: 1.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type B : Type f : A -> B a : option A e' : list (option A) IH : length (map f e') = length e' Unable to unify "length (map f e') = length e'" with "length match a with | Some a => Some (f a) :: map f e' | None => None :: map f e' end = S (length e')".

chat.content:
Help me to prove a theorem in Coq, based on provided proof states including hypotheses and goals. Give a complete proof in only one single code block without explanations, extra definitions. Give a complete proof in one response, only give the proof body, without repeating the definition and "Proof.". Avoid existing names when using intros. Write the commands separately, without ";" and "[cmd|cmd]". Use bullets for structure, NEVER use "{" and "}". When -, + and * are used out, proceed to double versions like --, ++, etc. For example, given proof state:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m
============================
m + S n = S n + m
The hypotheses n, m: nat and IHn: m + n = n + m are given first, then the goal, m + S n = S n + m, separated by =. Expect a response like: 
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.``` 
You do not intros any terms because all terms have already been introduced.

When I give:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m
============================
n, m: nat
your answer should be like:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```
Definitions and lemmas related to the proof will be provided, use them accordingly.


Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (e : env A), length (map f e) = length e

Premises:
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.D {TA TX AA
length : forall A : Type, list A -> nat
map : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> env A -> list (option B)
env = fun A : Type => list (option A) : Type -> Type Arguments env _%type_scope
map_map_vanish : forall (A B : Type) (f : B -> A) (g : A -> B) (e : env A), (forall x : A, f (g x) = x) -> map f (map g e) = e
map_raw_insert : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (x : nat) (e : env A), map f (raw_insert x None e) = raw_insert x None (map f e)
map_insert : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A), map f (insert x a e) = insert x (f a) (map f e)
map_insert_eq : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (x : nat) (a : A) (b : B) (e : env A), f a = b -> map f (insert x a e) = insert x b (map f e)
map_map_fuse : forall (A B C : Type) (f : B -> C) (g : A -> B) (h : A -> C) (e : env A), (forall d : A, f (g d) = h d) -> map f (map g e) = map h e
lookup_map_none : forall (A B : Type) (x : nat) (e : env A) (f : A -> B), lookup x e = None -> lookup x (map f e) = None
lookup_map_some_reverse : forall (A B : Type) (x : nat) (b : B) (e : env A) (f : A -> B), lookup x (map f e) = Some b -> exists a : A, lookup x e = Some a /\ b = f a
lookup_map_some : forall (A B : Type) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A) (f : A -> B), lookup x e = Some a -> lookup x (map f e) = Some (f a)
fold_insert : forall (A B : Type) (f : option A -> B -> B) (o : option A) (e : env A) (accu : B), fold f (raw_insert 0 o e) accu = f o (fold f e accu)
map_length : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A), length (List.map f l) = length l
fold_invariant : forall (A B : Type) (P : env A -> B -> Prop) (f : option A -> B -> B) (accu : B), P (empty A) accu -> (forall (o : option A) (e : env A) (accu0 : B), P e accu0 -> P (raw_insert 0 o e) (f o accu0)) -> forall e : env A, P e (fold f e accu)
map_map_exchange : forall (A F G B : Type) (f1 : F -> B) (f2 : A -> F) (g1 : G -> B) (g2 : A -> G) (e : env A), (forall d : A, f1 (f2 d) = g1 (g2 d)) -> map f1 (map f2 e) = map g1 (map g2 e)
map_insert_map : forall (A : Type) (f g h : A -> A) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A), (forall a0 : A, f (g a0) = g (h a0)) -> map f (insert x a (map g e)) = insert x (f a) (map g (map h e))
length_insert_general : forall (A : Type) (x k : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), length e = k -> length (raw_insert x o e) = mymax (1 + k) (1 + x)
partition_length : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l l1 l2 : list A), partition f l = (l1, l2) -> length l = length l1 + length l2
map_nth_error : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (n : nat) (l : list A) (d : A), nth_error l n = Some d -> nth_error (List.map f l) n = Some (f d)
length_insert_reverse_2 : forall (A : Type) (e : env A) (k x : nat) (a : A), length (insert x a e) <= k + 1 -> length e <= k
lookup_beyond_length : forall (A : Type) (e : env A) (x : nat), length e <= x -> lookup x e = None
map_empty : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B), map f (empty A) = empty B
length_monotonic : forall (A : Type) (e : env A) (k1 k2 : nat), length e <= k1 -> k1 <= k2 -> length e <= k2
f_equal_nat : forall (B : Type) (f : nat -> B) (x y : nat), x = y -> f x = f y
defined_implies_below_length : forall (A : Type) (e : env A) (x k : nat) (a : A), length e <= k -> lookup x e = Some a -> x < k
existsb_nth : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l : list A) (n : nat) (d : A), n < length l -> existsb f l = false -> f (nth n l d) = false
length_insert : forall (A : Type) (x k km1 : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), length e <= km1 -> km1 <= k - 1 -> x < k -> length (raw_insert x o e) <= k
lookup_successor : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (e : env A), lookup (S x) e = lookup x (tl e)
length_insert_independent : forall (A : Type) (e : env A) (k x : nat) (a : A), length (insert x a e) <= k -> forall (y : nat) (o : option A), y < k -> length (raw_insert y o e) <= k
empty_eq_insert : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (o : A) (e : env A), empty A = insert x o e -> False
fold : forall A B : Type, (option A -> B -> B) -> env A -> B -> B
length_insert_reverse_1 : forall (A : Type) (e : env A) (k x : nat) (a : A), length (insert x a e) <= k -> x < k
lookup_insert_recent : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), x < y -> lookup x (raw_insert y o e) = lookup x e

```coq
intros A B f e.
induction e as [|a e' IH].
- simpl. reflexivity.
- simpl. f_equal. apply IH.
Qed.
```

original: intros A B f e. induction e as [|a e' IH]. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. f_equal. apply IH.
